techmeme.title: Sources: many Meta employees are furious about its moderation changes that allow "allegations of mental illness" when based on "gender or sexual orientation" (Jason Koebler/404 Media)
NYC-based Captions, an AI-powered video editing app, introduces a free tier with basic video editing tools, while keeping AI features in the $10/month Pro tier (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Hippocratic AI, which is building an LLM for health care, raised a $141M Series B, valuing the company at $1.64B, and launches a health care AI agent app store (Heather Landi/Fierce Healthcare)
Sources: Musk is probing how he and his right-wing allies can go beyond aggressive X posts to destabilize the UK Labour government and remove Keir Starmer as PM (Financial Times)
Elon Musk calls on California and Delaware AGs to force OpenAI to auction off a large stake in its business; source: OpenAI had no plans for such an auction (George Hammond/Financial Times)
